text: Fabrice Santoro won in the final of first edition of this tournament. He defeated Rik de Voest 7–5, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Final four=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Soweto Open - Singles 2009 Men's Singles
